title: I Am Better than Him, Right? - Novel Updates
author: アサクラ ネル
description:
“I think I’ve found someone I like….”
What? Kano Mizusawa’s soul almost left the earth for a moment at those words.
Her childhood friend, Nene Horimiya. With her soft, semi-long hair, she is attractive, has excellent grades except in sports, and is very family-oriented and considerate.
–Kano likes Nene.
Even though they are both girls. Before she knew it, she had become more than just her best friend. And yet….The first thing that comes to mind is the fact that the two of them have been in the same room together for a long time.

“I can’t give you my heart, but I can give you my body…!” (!?)
Thus, Kano’s reckless and a little extreme [strategy to capture Nene] begins!>
